runs.comm: Gambhir stays in his crease to a good length ball coming into him and nudges behind square
Rahane stays on the back foot and defends towards cover

slightly fuller, angling away from the right-hander, Rahane stays in his crease and opens the face of his bat as he square drives through backward point, this outfield is extremely quick and third man has no chance
shorter length and Rahane is beaten as he fends away from his body
short of a length and straight, Rahane fends the ball close on the off side and Gambhir sprints through
145 kph, Gambhir nudges the good length ball with the angle into him towards square, he seems short of time to play a shot, does Gambhir

length ball outside off and at a pace that allows Gambhir to move forward and play a flowing drive through cover, he hit through the line and timed it beautifully. True bounce on this pitch and the ball is coming on
steered towards third man for a single
look at the ball go across this outfield, Rahane slapped the ball off the front foot through cover, once it was past the infield there's no use chasing
Rahane chases a wider ball as it slants across him from over the wicket and is beaten
good length and closer to off stump, Rahane pushes from his crease towards cover
nudged off the pads towards midwicket
good length on middle and off at 146 kph, Rahane stays in his crease and plays towards Umar Akmal at backward point, he throws at the bowler's end, hoping to catch Gambhir out of his crease
Rahane tries to open the face and steer a short of a length ball that rises quite a bit towards third man, he's beaten
fuller ball so Rahane jumps back and taps towards square leg for a single
short of a length angling into the left-hander, Gambhir works the ball off his hips towards short fine leg, the fielder throws at the bowler's end again, and Rahane has to hurry back
a short-arm pull towards backward square leg, Gul fumbles and allows the single
141 kph, Gambhir is hit on the pad as he tries to work the ball on the leg side, Irfan isn't letting the batsmen get on to the front foot at all
played towards wide mid-on for a single
Gambhir begins to come forward and then he decides to go back and close the face of the bat against a short of a length ball, he gets a leading edge that lobs towards third man
short and wide outside off, room for Rahane and he slashes, carving the ball over point for a one-bounce four
too full on the pads, Rahane moves across his crease and glances to the backward square leg boundary
wider outside the off stump on a decent length, Rahane lets it go
a slower ball on middle stump, Rahane moves across and nudges off his pads for a single towards square leg
good length angling into the right-hander, Rahane stays back and works the ball off his hips behind square
Gambhir cuts and places the ball to the third man boundary, a thick outside edge that was but it was too fine of the fielder on the boundary
that's where he wanted to hit the previous ball, this time he stepped well out of his crease, made room, and slashed, cutting the ball flat over the in field for a one-bounce four
banged in short and Gambhir tries to hook, the ball hits the gloves and just evades the leaping Kamran Akmal for a third boundary in a row. Motera is humming now

that looks plumb and the umpire agrees. Gul delivers a slower ball, pitching outside off and angling into the left-hander, Gambhir heaves towards the leg side but was beaten by the change of pace. He was hit on the back foot and the impact was quite adjacent. Gul's bounced back from a hammering
Kohli moves forward and pushes away from his body at a good length ball that angles into him, he gets an inside edge on to his back leg
Rahane stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
goes back and plays the ball towards square leg
this time he places the ball in front of square after going deep into his crease
played off the back foot towards square
makes room by moving outside leg stump and punches through mid-on
punched off the back foot, and once Ahmed Shehzad fails to make a clean stop running forward from midwicket, the batsmen run the single
Kohli punches the length ball through cover, 137 kph that was, the batsmen try and put pressure on the fielder running in from the deep but can't take a second
the yorker but it isn't quite right, Rahane flicks towards deep backward square leg
played off the back foot towards point
short of a length, angling into the right-hander from over the wicket, Rahane plays a short-arm pull along the ground to deep midwicket
136 kph, Kohli flicks the ball off his pads towards deep midwicket

caught and bowled! Rahane tried to pull a short ball but he was early on the shot and ended up toe-ending it back to Gul for the simplest of catches. It just lobbed back to the bowler. And just like that India's good start has been neutralised.
Kohli stays back to a 137 kph ball on a good length and defends on the off side
a fuller ball with width outside off, driven along the ground to the fielder on the cover boundary
pushed in front of point, Yuvraj wanted a single but Kohli did not

that ball leaps at Yuvraj from short of a length and fizzes past the bat, it contonues to climb and Akmal had to leap with hands outstretched above his head to collect it. Smiles all around, but not from Yuvraj.

the short ball followed by a yorker homing into Yuvraj's boot from 11 feet high. 144 kph that was and it smashed into his boot. Yuvraj is in pain, he's down and needs the physio. There was a loud appeal for lbw but the ball was missing leg.

shot! Kohli stayed in his crease, watched the full ball all the way on to the middle of his bat and played a superb straight drive. Not much flourish but he didn't need it. A minimalistic punch past mid-off.
Yuvraj stays back and taps the ball towards the leg side for a single
the legbreak just outside off stump, Kohli goes back and defends to the bowler
a fuller ball outside off, Kohli drives off the front foot through cover, Umar Akmal covers lots of ground in little time in the deep and keeps the batsmen to a single
punched off the back foot towards long on
pulled off the back foot through midwicket
Yuvraj tucks the ball off his pads behind square
Yuvraj stays back and mis-times the ball just in front of square, he wanted to hit that finer
just a bit too short and Kohli is on to the back foot in a flash, pulling the ball flat over the in-field for a one-bounce four to the cow corner boundary
worked off the pads through midwicket
Yuvraj moves forward and nudges the ball off his pads behind square
Kohli steps out of his crease and drives the ball through wide mid-on
that's a short ball and it stops on Yuvraj a little, he closed the face of the bat, trying to tap it on the leg side, and got a leading edge that fell short of Ajmal
Kohli skips out and makes room to loft the full ball straight back over the bowler's head
nudged towards point for a single
worked off the back foot through midwicket for a single
cut off the back foot towards point, Kohli mis-timed that
short ball and Kohli once again mis-timed the cut, the ball was a bit quicker so it hurried on to him

Yuvraj stays back and swats a shorter delivery wide of the fielder at short fine leg and too fine for the man on the backward square leg boundary. Poor line to bowl when fine leg is in the circle - too much on leg stump

Afridi leaps at midwicket and gets a hand to it but can't catch it, he takes pace off the ball though which allows the fielder at deep midwicket enough time to save the four. Kohli pulled that very hard. A superb effort from Afridi
played towards cover for a single
cut off the back foot towards point
Kohli steps out to hit on the leg side but is cramped for room and ends up mis-timing a cut towards point
hit from the crease to long off for a single

Kohli's been run out! Yuvraj glanced the ball firmly and straight to short fine leg. There was no single there really, Kohli had to hope for Ajmal to miss with his throw at the striker's end. Instead, he watched middle stump get uprooted.
a full ball drilled down the ground for a single to long off
Dhoni gets going by lofting a fuller and more flighted ball over extra cover and into the gap on the boundary
nudged off the front foot through point for a single, the throw to Afridi was hard and fast and he wasn't happy with it
that's the first six of the game! Yuvraj gets down on one knee and slams the ball into the stands beyond the midwicket boundary
did he edge that or open the face? Either way the ball raced to the third man boundary. Yuvraj came forward and used the pace of the ball by opening the face a little to steer it past the keeper
pushed off the front foot towards point
stays back and works the ball off his pad behind square
a full toss and it's been driven to the fielder on the cover boundary
good length from over the wicket, Dhoni moves back and across and blocks
a full toss and Dhoni hits it from the crease to deep cover
Dhoni tries to drive a good length ball that pitches on middle and off and slants away from the right hander, he is beaten
a low full toss, which Dhoni drives from his crease towards mid off
that's in the stands. Yuvraj lunges on to the front foot, gets down low, winds up and swings hard, slugging the ball flat over the cow corner boundary
defended on the back foot
Yuvraj plays the sweep but can't beat short third man
Dhoni goes back and nudges towards midwicket
on the pads and Dhoni nudges towards short fine leg
punched off the back foot towards the bowler
short of a length but too much down leg side, Dhoni tries to glance but misses, the ball brushes his thigh and races to the fine leg boundary
worked off the pads through square leg and the batsmen sprint between the wickets to take the second
short ball and Dhoni is ready and waiting, he moves back so quickly and pulls with power, finding the square leg boundary
shot! Dhoni moves forward and simply launches a length ball over extra cover, lots of bottom hand in that stroke
good length on off stump, Dhoni punches towards long off. Over to Yuvraj
a yorker, which Yuvraj digs out on the off side
Dhoni aims for the heave over midwicket but gets an inside edge that takes the ball towards short fine leg. Yuvraj calls Dhoni through
Yuvraj gets yorked but manages to keep the ball out

Mohammad Irfan takes a lot of time to get down to field the ball and lets it go through his legs for a boundary. Yuvraj had come out of his crease and glanced the ball off his pads towards short fine leg after Hafeez cramped him for room
played towards cover for a single
Dhoni hits the ball along the ground to long on, he was unable to get under it
width outside off and Yuvraj cuts hard off the back foot, placing the ball between backward point and short third man
good length from round the wicket, angling the ball into the right-hander, Dhoni stays back and hits the ball through mid-off
Yuvraj launches the ball into the stands at midwicket. He waits in his crease, uses the angle into him from over the wicket, and carts it far over the boundary
another one! This one is too short and Yuvraj has lots of time to swivel and pull, hitting it off the front foot to bring up his half century
nearly in the blockhole and Yuvraj drills the ball hard and straight into the bowler's foot
a low full toss wide outside off, Yuvraj reaches for it and mis-times the drive through extra cover
Dhoni gets into the act, driving a length ball from his crease into the gap on the extra cover boundary, India on course for a big score on this true pitch with fast outfields
bowled into the blockhole and Yuvraj digs it out in front of point for a single
I think Dhoni wanted to hit that over extra cover but he ended up scooping it over the bowler's head, an odd shot
slogged towards deep midwicket for a single
that's too short and Yuvraj was ready and waiting, opening up his stance and pulling the ball down on one knee over deep backward square leg
and again! Yuvraj uses the angle into him from round the wicket and swings hard, launching the ball high and far, there's a scrum in the crowd to catch it as it lands
a hat-trick of sixes! Yuvraj clears his front foot out of the way and golf swings a fuller ball over the long-on boundary. He's timing it like a dream
nearly in the blockhole and Dhoni flicks towards deep backward square leg

superbly caught on the straight boundary! Yuvraj stayed in his crease and launched the ball dead straight, Malik ran to his left from long off and caught it just as it was about to clear the boundary. Yuvraj exits to rousing applause from a strong Motera crowd
Dhoni stays in his crease and plays a whippy drive to long on, a helicopter shot but along the ground
nudged off the boots behind square
middle stump is flat on its back. Dhoni tries to run a yorker from just outside off towards third man and plays on. Gul's bowling a terrific final over. Only three runs off the first five balls.
Gul, what have you done? He's over-stepped off what should have been the final ball of the innings. It was a full toss down leg side and Rohit did not connect with the paddle
a costly error indeed. Rohit makes room and carves a full ball high over point, the ball bounces just inside the boundary
